idea-plugin.name: Quick Memo
idea-plugin.description:
Just open to take notes in your IDE

생각을 뇌에서 놓아주세요. 그냥 메모하세요


Default Keymap:

  • macOS: Option + M
  • Windows/Linux: Ctrl + Q

Set up your preferred shortcut:

  1. Settings/Preferences -> Keymap
  2. Search "Open/Close Quick Memo"
  3. Change keymap
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1. Changed default MacOS shortcut from 'Option + Shift + M' to 'Option + M' for better accessibility
  2. Added default padding to text input area in TextArea for improved readability
  3. Added text size adjustment feature using Ctrl + Mouse Wheel
  4. Added toast popup notification when creating a new memo
  5. Added default padding to text input area in TextArea for improved readability
  6. Added auto-focus to editor when QuickMemo window opens.
  7. Refactored internal UI structure
  8. Added alert when memo creation fails
  9. Added alert when no memo to delete

  1. MacOS 단축키 'Option + M'로 변경
